text: Very new restaurant on the block. When we had went, a lot of the menu sadly was not available. We did enjoy some delicious tacos and a lovely starter salad. Would like to see how this new restaurant grows.

Premium presentation. The space is nicely done.. but the food just wasn't very good. Watery and cold. The plate was a mess of water with the first bite. 

Service was kind and clear, but the kitchen was very very slow.

The tuna tacos which were priced at a premium.. two words:

Canned Tuna.
uen belle surprise dans le quartier!

Pedro redeemed himself , the place was great to hang out in the mile-end, a must try
Sad to hear the news, rip
